projects.name: Happy Thoughts
projects.description: A React project focused on state management, API interactions for fetching and posting data. Features include a design-aligned UI, sorted thought display by recency, like count for each thought, a form for new thoughts, and a like functionality.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: This project involves creating a weather web application fetching weather information API. Key features include fetching and presenting weather data accurately, implementing design-aligned UI elements, and incorporating functionalities such as displaying current weather, sunrise/sunset times, 5-day forecast, and responsive design.

projects.name: Music Releases
projects.description: A React app template to display albums. Features include a structured component hierarchy, design fidelity, hover effects, and responsive layouts. Clicking on albums or artists links to external URLs. Components provided; focus on data flow and UI interactions.

projects.name: Chatbot
projects.description: This project includes a chatbot developed with JavaScript, focusing on user input handling. A structured conversational flow was implemented, along with conditional responses for invalid inputs. Advanced features like CSS styling enhancements and form element selection were explored.

projects.name: Survey
projects.description: A React project to create a customizable survey form. Focus on React state and form control. After submission, users see a summary. Design is flexible but should prioritise accessibility. Followed a given design in Figma.

projects.name: Recipe library
projects.description: The JavaScript app displays recipes from an array upon website loading, offering filtering by cuisine type and sorting by properties like ingredient count or cooking time. It includes a random item selector, a search bar for keyword-specific searches, and is styled for optimal user experience.
